data.title: Fixed palettes in the assets browser when the shellmap is disabled
data.body: Closes https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/issues/10762.

data.title: Filter the lua PlayerProperties on Requires

milestone.title: release-20161015
milestone.description: Stability release with burning trees and video installation.

data.body:
Fixes https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/11474#discussion_r70184465.

All missions should work again~~, except allies01 (the testcase)~~.

data.title: Remove additional "Kills/Death" column
data.body:
from the statistic-screen , as it is wasting space and only adds useless information 

the original idea of this , was to sort of determine a "skill" by calculating "kills : deaths" which is a established form of measuring skill in some FPS's ( Battlefield for example)

since OpenRA's is containing (at this point) mostly RTS-games ... this column is useless ... 
as in realtime-strategy games there are more things important beside "killing units" to win a game 

@obrakmann 's player-experience is (imo) something that helps getting a column with more useful information

![statistic](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/9139965/16715035/ae38b690-46d5-11e6-812e-639aac1c556d.png)

data.title: Enable tracking of player experience in all mods
data.body:
This PR adds granting player experience via the `SupplyTruck`, `Captures`, `ExternalCaptures`, `Infiltrates`, `RepairableBuilding` and `RepairsUnits` traits.

Except for capturing and infiltrating, experience is only granted when those operations are carried out on allied actors. Experience through capturing is only granted when capturing enemy structures, not neutral ones.

This will cross a few things off of the list in #11452.

data.title: [RA] Oil Derricks not being used by the AI during Skirmish
data.body: I don't know if this is a known issue, but it's disappointing the AI isn't aware of the cash flow produced by the Oil Derricks. I created a few maps for multiplayer and it seems the AI relies on ore and diamonds only. When there are no more resources the AI immediately stops and acts like a sitting duck surrounded by unclaimed Oil Derricks. Very unfortunate and makes the game finish very quickly and not that challenging. Could this be fixed?

data.title: Reload activity breaks building sell
data.body: This is probably the same underlying problem that happend with the repair pad in https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/issues/7225. If I rearm a helicopter and sell it during a reload action, the heli pad becomes unsellable. Noticed during testing of https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/11620.

data.title: Implement the TS Cluster Missile.
data.body: Resolves #7773.

data.title: Fixed a potential NRE in DownloadPackageLogic.ShowDownloadDialog
data.body: This fixes a possible crash introduced in https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/11375 which was detected by Coverity.

data.title: Fixed parent package from ZipFile not getting disposed.
data.body: This tries to fix another defect from #11482, which was detected by Coverity.

data.title: Added With*ControlGroup
data.body: This splits the control group rendering from `SelectionDecorations` which gives a choice to render this with fonts (Tiberian Sun and above) or sprites or not at all. A followup of https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/11565 and https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/11567.

data.title: Order landed aircraft to take off if their reservation is cancelled.
data.body:
Aircraft will now take off when their airfield/helipad is sold or destroyed from under them.

Fixes #11610.

data.title: Fix service depot selling.
data.body: Fixes #7225.

data.title: When building submaries, audio clip "Training" plays instead of "Building"
Helicopter does not remember / re-attack surfacing sub
data.body: If you send a heli to attack a sub, the heli will stop shooting and remain hovering when the sub submerges. When the sub resurfaces, the heli needs to be told to attack again.

data.title: Too many simultaneous "UNIT LOST"
data.body: If many units get destroyed at once, the game plays "UNIT LOST" loud enough to distort speakers.

data.title: Ore truck with inaccessible destination just stops
data.body: If an ore truck has an inaccessible destination it will stop rather than pick up other nearby ore.

data.title: Instructing group of rocket soliders to hit inaccessible target causes game to slow significantly
data.body: Instructing group of rocket soliders to hit inaccessible target causes game to slow significantly

data.title: Rocket Soldier Sounds
data.body: Rocket Soldiers make different launch sounds when they're firing at planes or when they're firing at water.

data.title: A V2 firing into a war factory - no graphic
data.body: A V2 firing into a war factory makes no explosion graphic.

data.title: Rifle Infantry cannot damage heavy tanks.
data.body: Rifle Infantry cannot damage heavy tanks.

data.title: Airfields can be sold with planes on them
data.body: If you sell an airfield with a plane on it, the airfield just disappears under the plane.

data.title: Cannot Sell Units
data.body: Cannot sell units that are on service depot.

data.title: Selling occupied Service Depot
data.body: If you sell an occupied service depot, you get credit but the service depot remains (and cannot be sold).

data.title: Missile subs can't shoot missile subs
data.body: Missile subs fire missiles instead of torpedoes at other missile subs.

data.title: Destroying bridge makes units inop

data.body: If a unit has a destination across a bridge when the bridge gets destroyed, the unit gets stuck and cannot be given new orders.

data.title: Update keyboard scrolling at render rate.
data.body: Fixes #9275.

data.title: Fix input reset crash

milestone.title: release-20161015
milestone.description: Stability release with burning trees and video installation.

data.body:
#11130 introduced a crash when pressing the reset button in the input settings tab.

This fixes the crash by adding UI bindings for those keys and splits out a new hotkey section to help with organization.

data.title: Fix resizing of packaged maps.

data.body: Fixes #11597, which was missed by #11482.

data.title: Update AUTHORS with Open.Nat.
data.body:
Fixes #11593.

I'm **really** unsure about if this is how it should be noted though.

data.title: Replace reworked singles and doubles maps with originals
data.body: Replacing the reworked singles and doubles maps with their original counterparts. These were the only two 'heavily' reworked maps that made it into a release and they don't seem to sit well with some of the more nostalgic players.
